scripts.update-CI-snapshots: docker run --rm --network host -v $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ -it mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.25.1-jammy /bin/bash -c 'npm install && npx playwright install && npm run update-local-snapshots && exit'
scripts.run-headless-CI: docker run --rm --network host -v $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ -it mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.25.1-jammy /bin/bash -c 'npm install && npx playwright install && npm run headless && exit'
